Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery Type B kantharos with probable turn to lower handle attachment; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number 7 is written on a paper label glued to the interior surface of the sherd, and is also written in pencil on the exterior surface.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 679, no. 378)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1695) (phase 2)
